CustomField.description: When "Incremental Recurring Donation Non-Skew" is checked, this field determines the amount of days after being modified that an Opportunity should be included in Recurring Donation Rollup Batches.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When "Incremental Recurring Donation Non-Skew" is checked, this field determines the amount of days after being modified that an Opportunity should be included in Recurring Donation Rollup Batches.
CustomField.label: Recurring Donation Last N Days
